metadata.title: CVE-2016-1251 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
There is a vulnerability of type use-after-free affecting DBD::mysql (akaDBD-mysql or the Database Interface (DBI) MySQL driver for Perl) 3.x and4.x before 4.041 when used with mysql_server_prepare=1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbd-mysql-perl - 4.041-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.041-2build1').
